name: Earth, Wind, Fire, Water
description:
To win the game,

Fill your cup with water.

You must also learn to help the other player win too, because

Either everybody wins or nobody wins.

This is a text-based puzzle game. The players are you and the computer.

It's a twist on wooden peg games and rock-paper-scissors, with more choices and possibilities.

To play, download the executable file and run it. The game runs in the console window. In case of any questions, a 1-page information sheet is included.
